statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_data LIMIT 10
SELECT id, vehicle_type, distance FROM transportation_data WHERE route_id = 5
SELECT timestamp, avg_speed FROM transportation_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_type, avg_speed FROM transportation_data WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC
SELECT route_id, vehicle_type, distance FROM transportation_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_type, avg_speed FROM transportation_data WHERE route_id = 10 ORDER BY avg_speed ASC
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM transportation_data GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM transportation_data GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING AVG(distance) > 50
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, passenger_count FROM Transportation_Data WHERE passenger_count > 50;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM Transportation_Data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT id, passenger_count FROM Transportation_Data WHERE route_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data WHERE passenger_count > 50 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM Infrastructure_Planning WHERE estimated_cost > 100000 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, passenger_count FROM Transportation_Data WHERE route_id = 5 AND passenger_count BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT id, project_name, estimated_cost FROM Infrastructure_Planning WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY estimated_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM transportation_stations ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM transportation_routes WHERE start_station_id = 1;
SELECT passenger_name, age, gender FROM transportation_passengers WHERE ticket_type = 'Regular';
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM transportation_stations WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transportation_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, operational_status FROM transportation_stations WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT passenger_name, age, gender, ticket_type FROM transportation_passengers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT start_station_id, end_station_id, COUNT(passenger_id) AS passenger_count FROM transportation_passengers GROUP BY start_station_id, end_station_id ORDER BY passenger_count DESC;
SELECT t.station_id, t.station_name, r.route_name, r.route_description FROM transportation_stations t JOIN transportation_routes r ON t.station_id = r.start_station_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_data ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT owner_name, vehicle_type, location FROM transportation_data WHERE location='City Center';
SELECT registration_number, owner_name FROM transportation_data WHERE vehicle_type='Truck';
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY traffic_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, location, average_speed FROM traffic_analysis WHERE traffic_count>100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT registration_number, location FROM transportation_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' AND location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT owner_name, vehicle_type, location FROM transportation_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY owner_name ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(traffic_count) AS average_traffic, MAX(average_speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_analysis GROUP BY location HAVING average_traffic > 1000 ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE budget > 100000 AND status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data;
SELECT id, location, speed FROM Transportation_Data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT location, population FROM Infrastructure_Planning ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM Development_Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, policy_name, effective_date FROM Public_Policy WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Development_Projects WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT location, speed FROM Transportation_Data WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' AND speed > 60 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Public_Policy WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level, analysis_results FROM Traffic_Analysis WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
